title: Mononote: Edo Shinobi Kagyou
sinopse: If he grabs a sword, he looks like a beast full of blades. During the Edo Period, there was a rumor of a certain monster called "Mononote" running over all the Nakasendou Route. Okota, a traveling girl, meets Hitatsura, a boy with strange "reversed hands." Ninja's daily work during peace times! Meet the hard and magnificent world of Edo ninja's humble jobs.
